pli-tv-pvr10:1.1: Arranging the robe over one shoulder,
pli-tv-pvr10:1.2: stretching forth the Joined palms in salutation,
pli-tv-pvr10:1.4: for what purpose are you come here? /
pli-tv-pvr10:2.2: that come up for recitation on Observance days,
pli-tv-pvr10:2.3: How many are these rules of training?
pli-tv-pvr10:3.1: Fortunate for you is the emergence,
pli-tv-pvr10:3.4: (so that you may be) skilled herein. /
